languages.text: Доверив решение оставшихся проблем верным офицерам, Лорд-капитан направляется туда, где {mf|ему|ей} и положено быть — на мостик корабля.
Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.
languages.original_text: Доверив решение оставшихся проблем верным офицерам, Лорд-капитан направляется туда, где {mf|ему|ей} и положено быть — на мостик корабля.

traits.locale_text: Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.
Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.
Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

languages.text: Tras delegar en sus oficiales de confianza la gestión de los otros problemas, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} se dirige a su puesto: el puente.
languages.original_text: Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Tras delegar en sus oficiales de confianza la gestión de los otros problemas, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} se dirige a su puesto: el puente.

languages.text: 领主舰长委托{mf|他|她}忠诚的军官处理剩下的问题，之后动身前往{mf|他|她}该去的地方——舰桥。
languages.original_text: Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长委托{mf|他|她}忠诚的军官处理剩下的问题，之后动身前往{mf|他|她}该去的地方——舰桥。

languages.text: 自身の忠実な士官達に残った問題の対応を任せて、ロード・キャプテンは正当な持ち場であるブリッジへ向かった。
languages.original_text: Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

traits.locale_text: 自身の忠実な士官達に残った問題の対応を任せて、ロード・キャプテンは正当な持ち場であるブリッジへ向かった。

languages.text: Nachdem er seine loyalen Offiziere mit der Bewältigung der verbleibenden Probleme betraut hat, begibt sich der Lord Captain an seinen rechtmäßigen Platz … auf die Brücke.
languages.original_text: Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

languages.text: Après avoir confié les problèmes restants à ses officiers les plus loyaux, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} retourne à son poste sur le pont.
languages.original_text: Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir confié les problèmes restants à ses officiers les plus loyaux, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} retourne à son poste sur le pont.

languages.text: Sadık subaylarını da kalan sorunları halletmeye yollayan Lord Kaptan; bulunması gereken yere, köprüye doğru yola koyuluyor.
languages.original_text: Having entrusted {mf|his|her} loyal officers with handling the remaining problems, the Lord Captain heads to {mf|his|her} rightful station — the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Kalan sorunları hâlletmeye sadık subaylarını yollayan Lord Kaptan; bulunması gereken yere, yani köprüye doğru yola koyuluyor.
